Sri Lanka's treasures include: Sigiriya Rock Fortress, Temple of the Tooth Relic (Kandy), Galle Fort, Yala National Park, Adam's Peak, Nuwara Eliya tea country, Anuradhapura ancient city, and Mirissa beaches.
Must-visit sites: Cultural Triangle sites, Ella's Nine Arch Bridge, Udawalawe Elephant Sanctuary, Polonnaruwa ruins, and Bentota beaches.

patterns: What should I know about traditions?
responses: When visiting temples: Cover shoulders/knees, remove shoes/hats. Avoid touching Buddha statues. Receive items with right hand. Always ask permission before taking photos of people.
Sri Lankans appreciate modest dress. Nudity is illegal. Public displays of affection frowned upon. Remove shoes in homes.
West/South coasts best Dec-Apr. East coast best May-Sep. Hill Country good year-round. Yala monsoon May-Aug, Maha monsoon Oct-Jan.
Ideal time: January to April for beaches. July-August for festivals. November for wildlife watching.
Must-try: Rice & curry, hoppers (appa), kottu roti, string hoppers, lamprais, pol sambol. Desserts: wattalappam, kalu dodol. Drink: Ceylon tea, king coconut water!
Sri Lankan specialties: Jaffna crab curry, ambul thiyal (sour fish), wood apple juice. Street food: isso wade (shrimp fritters), rotti.
Options: trains (scenic routes), buses (cheap but crowded), private drivers (₹5000-8000/day). Tuk-tuks for short trips - negotiate first! Train recommended for Colombo-Kandy-Ella route.
Use PickMe app for taxis. Trains best booked in advance. Domestic flights available to Jaffna/Batticaloa.
Yala (leopards), Udawalawe (elephants), Minneriya (The Gathering), Sinharaja (birds), Wilpattu (sloth bears). Best safaris at dawn.
Top wildlife: Udawalawe Elephant Transit Home, Kumana Bird Sanctuary, Gal Oya National Park boat safaris.
Options: Colombo luxury hotels, Galle heritage mansions, Kandy guesthouses, Ella eco-lodges, Arugam Bay surf camps, Wilpattu glamping.
Unique stays: Tea estate bungalows, rainforest eco-villas, converted Dutch warehouses in Galle Fort.
Key festivals: Esala Perahera (July/Aug - Kandy), Sinhala New Year (April), Vesak (May), Deepavali (Oct/Nov), Christmas (Coastal areas).
Don't miss: Kandy Perahera's elephant procession, Jaffna Nallur Festival, Dondra Perahera.
Top treks: Adam's Peak pilgrimage (Dec-May), Knuckles Range, Ella Rock, Horton Plains to World's End, Sinharaja Rainforest trails.
Hiking essentials: Start early, carry water, wear layers. Guides recommended for Knuckles/Mountain regions.
West: Bentota (family), Hikkaduwa (diving). East: Arugam Bay (surfing), Pasikuda (calm waters). South: Mirissa (whale watching), Tangalle (secluded).
Top beach activities: Whale watching (Mirissa), snorkeling (Pigeon Island), surfing (Midigama), turtle watching (Rekawa).
8 UNESCO Sites: Sigiriya, Polonnaruwa, Anuradhapura, Galle Fort, Sinharaja Forest, Kandy Sacred City, Dambulla Cave Temple, Central Highlands.
History trail: Anuradhapura's sacred Bodhi tree, Polonnaruwa's stone temples, Jaffna Fort, Colombo National Museum.
Most need Electronic Travel Authorization (ETA) - apply online 3 days before. 30-day tourist visa ≈ $50. Extensions possible at Immigration Dept.
Check eta.gov.lk. Requirements: Passport valid 6mo, return ticket, sufficient funds. Visa-free for some countries.
Generally safe. Avoid political gatherings. Use registered taxis. Emergency: 119 (police), 110 (ambulance). Recommended vaccines: Hep A, Typhoid.
Health: Drink bottled water, use mosquito repellent. Beware strong currents at beaches. Keep valuables secure.
Popular items: Ceylon tea, spices, handloom textiles, wooden masks, silver jewelry, batik clothing, lacquerware. Visit: Pettah Market, Laksala Govt. stores.
Best buys: Dilmah tea, blue sapphires (certified), Ayurveda products, traditional drums. Bargain in markets!
Sinhala: Ayubowan (hello), Istuti (thank you). Tamil: Vanakkam (hello), Nandri (thanks). English widely spoken in tourist areas.
Helpful phrases: 'Kohomada?' (How are you?), 'Mehe kiyada?' (How much?), 'Mata therumak nehe' (I don't understand).
Classic 10-day route: Colombo → Sigiriya → Kandy → Nuwara Eliya → Ella → Yala → Galle → Departure. Adjust for beaches/wildlife focus.
1 week: Cultural Triangle (3d), Hill Country (2d), South Coast (2d). 2 weeks: Add East Coast & Jaffna.
